mapper.select: SELECT pt.uke_no as ukeNo ,TO_CHAR(pt.receipt_date,'yyyy/MM/dd') as receiptDate ,hm.hp_name as hpName ,dm.dr_name as drName FROM drug_user.pt_tran pt ,drug_user.pt_master pm ,drug_user.hp_master hm ,drug_user.dr_master dm WHERE pt.del_flg = 0 AND pt.pt_no = pm.pt_no AND pt.hp_no = hm.hp_no AND pt.dr_no = dm.dr_no AND pt.pt_no = 1 ORDER BY pt.uke_no
